name: modporter-ai
description: AI-powered tool for converting Minecraft Java Edition mods to Bedrock Edition add-ons

scripts.install-all: pnpm install && cd frontend && pnpm install
scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && source .venv/bin/activate && python -m uvicorn src.main:app --reload --port 8000
scripts.test: pnpm run test:frontend && pnpm run test:backend
scripts.lint: pnpm run lint:frontend && pnpm run lint:backend
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && source .venv/bin/activate && python -m ruff check src/ tests/
scripts.format: pnpm run format:frontend && pnpm run format:backend
scripts.format:backend: cd backend && source .venv/bin/activate && python -m black src/ tests/ && python -m ruff check --fix src/ tests/

author: ModPorter AI Team
